name: Alcatraz (itch)
description:
Please note: this game is unfinished.

What's it got?

  • Intro/final level plus temporary bridging sequence.
  • Branching conversations

What's it missing?

  • The middle part.
  • Meaningful choices leading to multiple endings.

Description below...

Escape from the world's most infamous prison island.

Controls

  • Use the mouse to select conversation options.
  • Mouse and WASD keys to move.

Windows downloadable version is recommended for best performance.
